name: HTML-Tidy Gedit Plugin
short_description:
This plugin allows running Dave Ragget's HTML-Tidy utility from Gedit. It supports two operations: tidy, and tidy-check, as well as some conveniences, such as as easy configuration of Tidy's numerous parameters, and detection of relevant files for operations. 

The tidy operation configures tidy and runs it on the current document, while attempting to keep the insert cursor in the correct position. The tidy-check operation runs tidy, and displays on the bottom pane various errors and warnings. Clicking on them will scroll to the appropriate location.
